--------------------------- ----------------------------

Paul Tomlinson(Pierce Brosnan) is a handsome widower whose confidence, intelligence,
and passion forge an erotic love triangle between Tess Palmer(JoBeth Williams),
a successful psychiatrist and Carla Simmons(Virginia Madsen) one of Tess's most
unstable patients and Paul's ill-fated lover.

Drawn into a world of sex, passion and betrayal, Tess struggles to find the truth
about her new lover but soon uncovers hidden secrets, lies and murder.

In the end, is Paul who he says he is or who Carla says he was?

Enjoy the movie!

*Note*
IMDB has the runtime listed incorrectly.
